Verify the image has no watermark
Verify the modal's overflow-y is 'hidden'
Open the 'About Us' page 'https://company.com/about'
Verify the main 'Our Mission' heading uses font size 38px, font family 'Arial', and text color #0056b3
Verify the hero image has backdrop image 'about_hero.jpg' and backdrop dimension 'cover'
Verify the paragraph text has font size 16px, line height 1.7em, and max width 800px
Verify the 'Learn More' button has a background color #007bff, text color #ffffff, border radius 4px, and padding 12px 20px
Verify the team members section displays exactly 4 profiles, each with a profile image of 100x100px
Verify the company timeline has a column-gap of 50px
Verify the page footer is sticky to the bottom and has a background color #343a40
Verify the section containing 'Our Values' has a margin-top of 40px
Verify the page has min-height 100vh
Verify the 'Contact Us' link has a text-decoration 'none'
Navigate to 'https://dashboard.io/reports'
Verify the 'Export' button is visible, enabled, has an icon with SVG fill #007bff, and padding 8px 16px
Verify the report table contains exactly 10 rows and 5 columns
Verify the table header 'Date' has font weight 700 and font size 14px
Verify the 'Total Revenue' cell displays '$1,234,567.89' with color #28a745
Verify the date picker input field has a default value of '2023-10-01' to '2023-10-31'
Verify the chart canvas has width 700px and height 400px
Verify the chart data points have a stroke color #007bff and stroke width 3px
Verify the report filters are contained within a max-height of 150px with overflow-y 'auto'
Verify the report section has a display 'block'
Verify the date displayed includes the full timestamp
Load the shopping cart page 'https://shop.com/cart'
Verify exactly 3 items are present in the cart
Verify each cart item displays its name, e.g., 'Product X', with font size 18px and text color #333333
Verify the quantity selector has a default value of 1 for each item
Verify the subtotal '$120.00' is displayed with font weight 700
Verify the 'Checkout' button is enabled, has a background color #ffc107, text color #212529, and border radius 5px
Verify the 'Remove' button for each item has an aria-label 'Remove item from cart'
Verify the cart total section has padding 20px and a border-top 1px solid #dee2e6
Verify the cart items are arranged using display 'flex' with a row-gap of 20px
Verify the cart page has a min-width of 320px for mobile viewports
Verify the 'Checkout' button has a transition on background color with 300ms duration
Access the notification center 'https://app.com/notifications'
Verify exactly 5 unread notifications are present, each marked with a blue dot (SVG fill #007bff)
Verify each notification item has a background color #e9f7ef for unread status and #f8f9fa for read status
Verify the notification message 'New comment on your post' has font size 14px and color #212529
Verify the timestamp, e.g., '5 minutes ago', is displayed with font size 12px
Verify the 'Mark All as Read' button is clickable and has an opacity of 1
Verify the notification list has a max height of 400px with overflow-y 'auto'
Verify each notification has a border-bottom 1px solid #e0e0e0
Verify the notification bell icon has a z-index of 50
Verify the notification items are vertically aligned using align-items 'center'
Verify the notification message's word-spacing is normal
Examine the booking confirmation page 'https://travel.com/booking/confirm/123'
Verify the booking ID 'TRV-123456' is displayed with font weight 700 and font size 24px
Verify the 'Passenger Name' 'Alice Wonderland' is visible with font size 18px
Verify the flight details, e.g., 'Flight: AA123', have a line height 1.6em
Verify the 'Download e-ticket' button is visible, has a background color #007bff, text color #ffffff, and padding 10px 20px
Verify the total price '$500.00' is displayed in color #cc0000
Verify the confirmation page elements are centered horizontally using margin '0 auto'
Verify the QR code image is loaded, has source 'qrcode.png', and rendered dimensions 150x150px
Verify the page content has a max-width of 800px
Verify the 'Print' button is enabled and has an aria-label 'Print booking details'
Verify the confirmation message text-align is 'center'
Inspect the user registration form 'https://app.com/register'
Verify the 'Email' input field has a placeholder 'your@email.com', border 1px solid #ced4da, and height 48px
Verify the 'Confirm Password' input field is initially disabled until the 'Password' field is populated
Verify the 'Sign Up' button is visible, has a background color #28a745, font size 18px, and border radius 8px
Verify the 'I agree to the Terms' checkbox is unchecked by default
Verify the form error messages, e.g., 'Email is invalid', appear in red (#dc3545) with font size 14px
Verify the form has a max-width of 450px
Verify the form fields have a column-gap of 10px in a grid layout
Verify the registration process completes within 1.5 seconds
Verify the 'Sign Up' button becomes focused on tab navigation
Verify the form fields have a min-width of 280px
View the product carousel on homepage 'https://homepage.com'
Verify the carousel displays exactly 5 product cards
Verify each product card has width 280px, height 350px, with a box shadow '0 4px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.1)'
Verify the 'Next' and 'Previous' navigation buttons are visible and have an opacity of 0.8
Verify the product image for each card has a source like 'product_thumb_1.jpg' and object-fit 'cover'
Verify the product name, e.g., 'Laptop Pro', has font weight 600 and font size 16px
Verify the product price, e.g., '$1200', is displayed with color #e44d26
Verify the carousel advances automatically every 5 seconds using an animation of 'slideIn 5s linear infinite'
Verify the carousel container has overflow-x 'hidden'
Verify the 'Add to Wishlist' icon has an SVG stroke color of '#ffc107'
Verify the carousel has a min-height of 400px
Access the interactive map on 'https://mapapp.com/location/store1'
Verify the map is loaded and centered at coordinates (34.0522, -118.2437) with a zoom level of 12
Verify the store's pin icon is visible, has an SVG fill color #dc3545
Verify the store's pin icon has a transform 'scale(1.2)' on hover
Verify the 'Get Directions' button is enabled, has a background color #007bff, and text color #ffffff
Verify the store name 'Downtown Electronics' is displayed with font size 20px and font weight 700
Verify the operating hours 'Mon-Fri: 9 AM - 6 PM' are visible
Verify the map controls (zoom in/out) are positioned in the top-right corner with offset right 10px and offset top 10px
Verify the map container has width '100%' and height '600px'
Verify clicking the pin opens an info window with aria-label 'Store information'
Verify the map has no watermark
Verify the map tiles are fully loaded within 1 second
Open the 'Help & Support' chatbot on 'https://support.com'
Verify the chat widget is visible, positioned fixed at bottom 20px and right 20px, with width 350px and height 500px
Verify the chat header 'Live Support' has a background color #007bff and text color #ffffff
Verify the 'Type your message...' input field has a placeholder, border-radius 20px, and padding 10px 15px
Verify the 'Send' button is visible, clickable, and has an SVG fill color #007bff
Verify the initial bot message 'Hello! How can I help you today?' is displayed with font size 15px and color #333333
Verify the chat transcript area has overflow-y 'auto' and a max-height of 400px
Verify the chatbot response time is less than 500ms
Verify the chat window has a box-shadow '0 0 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.2)'
Verify the avatar images have border-radius '50%'
Verify the chat messages have a margin-bottom of 10px
